text: Grizzly Bay is a baylet of the San Francisco Bay, and an extension of Suisun Bay, which dips into Solano County, California. Grizzly Bay is home to many sloughs and wildlife areas in addition to the Fifth Reserve Fleet which is docked off the coast of Benicia. Suisun Slough and Cordelia Slough empty into Grizzly Bay. ==References== ==See also== * Hydrography of the San Francisco Bay Area Category:Bays of California Category:Bays of San Francisco Bay Category:Bodies of water of Solano County, California Category:Landforms of the San Francisco Bay Area Category:Tributaries of San Pablo Bay
title: Grizzly Bay
